EmailTemplate.name: NA_Tier3_Enterprise_Cold_EB.NA_Tier3_Enterprise_Cold_EB_Nurture_Email2
EmailTemplate.subject: Automate your workloads not your workers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Turbonomic <[[https://www.turbonomic.com]]> delivers workload automation for hybrid clouds, simultaneously optimizing performance, cost, and compliance in real time.
IT teams who automate with Turbonomic:
- Increase infrastructure utilization <[[https://turbonomic.com/whats-new/]]> - Lower cloud costs <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/public-cloud-management/]]> - Improve IT staff productivity <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/devops/]]> - Accelerate cloud migrations projects <[[https://www.turbonomic.comhttps://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/cloud-migration/]]> - Accelerate data center transformation projects <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/data-center-migration/]]>
Our mission is to deliver a software platform that continuously and automatically maintains the health of workloads, at scale, wherever they are deployed.
Let us know if you would like to learn more <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]>.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
